meanings.sent1: The soda made a loud fizz when I opened it.
meanings.sent2: I love the fizz of sparkling water.
meanings.sent3: The fizz of the bubbles in the bath sounded like a tiny orchestra.

meanings.definition: To make a bubbling or hissing sound
meanings.sent1: I heard the pot of water fizz as it boiled.
meanings.sent2: The soda will fizz if you shake it before opening.
meanings.sent3: The campfire began to fizz as the wood crackled.
meanings.sent4: Her anger seemed to fizz beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The rain fizzed against the windowpane.
